instruction: Name three famous European landmarks
output: Three famous European landmarks are the Eiffel Tower in Paris, France; the Colosseum in Rome, Italy; and Stonehenge in Wiltshire, England.

instruction: Find the type of flower referenced in the text below.
input: The house was surrounded by colorful roses.

instruction: Design an algorithm to rearrange the given values in ascending order.
Design a machine learning model to classify emails as spam or not spam.
Find the surface area of a cube with sides 3 cm long.
Create a mnemonic device based on the following list.
Parse the following sentence and identify each part of speech.
input: The happy dog jumped over the fence.
output:
The - determiner 
happy - adjective
dog - noun
jumped - verb
over - preposition
the - determiner 
fence - noun

instruction: Design a solution to evaluate a candidate's performance in a programming interview.
Determine the volume of a cube with sides 4 cm long.
Edit the text below to make it gender-inclusive.
input: The doctor encouraged his patient to make healthier decisions.
output: The doctor encouraged their patient to make healthier decisions.

instruction: Generate a unique algorithm for sorting a list of numbers.
If you were to receive one extra hour of free time in the day, what would you do?
output: If I had one extra hour of free time in the day, I would use it to catch up on some of my favorite shows that I have not had the time to watch. I would also use the extra time to try something new like going out for a hike or exploring a new restaurant in town.

instruction: Classify the following topic as either technology, business, travel, or sports
Summarize the following 3 paragraphs
input: The use of electric vehicles (EVs) has grown significantly in recent years as a result of technological advancements. Consumers are becoming more aware of the environmental and economic benefits of owning an EV, leading to an increase in the number of EVs sold. Governments at both the regional and global levels are incentivizing the purchase of electric vehicles through subsidies and tax breaks in order to encourage a shift from fossil fuels to cleaner and more renewable sources of energy.
output: Electric vehicle sales have grown rapidly in recent years due to advancements in technology and an increased awareness of the environmental and economic benefits of EVs. Governments are providing incentives, such as subsidies and tax breaks, to encourage a shift from traditional fossil fuels to cleaner and more renewable energy sources.

instruction: Convert a given text from British English to American English
Write a one-sentence description of a modern business
output: A modern business uses technology and innovation to stay ahead of the competition and maximize profits.

instruction: Categorize the following sentence as either an observation, inference, or evaluation
Given an array of numbers, you should output the median value
Describe the advantages of using the cloud for a business
output: The cloud provides businesses with many advantages such as increased scalability, improved flexibility, enhanced security, and reduced storage costs.
